text: Edoardo Angelo Martino Edoardo Angelo Martino (20 April 1910 – 5 December 1999) was an Italian Christian Democrats politician. He was a member of the Italian Chamber of Deputies from 1948 to 1963. He served as a European Commissioner from 1967 to 1970, as Commissioner for External Relations in the Rey Commission. ==References == Category:1910 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Christian Democracy (Italy) politicians Category:Italian European Commissioners Category:European Commissioners 1967–1970 Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy)
title: Edoardo Martino
